actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating certain land as the Finger Lakes National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Finger Lakes National Heritage Area Study Act of 2015

summary.text:
Finger Lakes National Heritage Area Study Act of 2015

This bill directs the Department of the Interior to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating specified counties and other areas in the state of New York as the Finger Lakes National Heritage Area.

titles.title: Finger Lakes National Heritage Area Study Act of 2015

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to assess the suitability and feasibility of designating certain land as the Finger Lakes National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
Finger Lakes National Heritage Area Study Act of 2015
